description: A store employs senior citizens who earn $500 per week and young adults who earn $750 per week. The store must keep the weekly wage bill below $30000. On any day, the store requires at least 50 workers, of whom at least 10 must be young adults. To ensure the store runs smoothly, the number of young adults should be at least a third the number of senior citizens. Formulate a LP to minimize the wage bill.

objective.description: "Minimize the total wage bill of the store"

constraints.description: The weekly wage bill should not exceed $30000
There must be at least 50 workers in total each day
There must be at least 10 young adults each day
The number of young adults must be at least one third of the number of senior citizens
The number of senior citizens and young adults must be non-negative

numSeniorCitizens.definition: Number of senior citizens employed per week

numYoungAdults.definition: Number of young adults employed per week
